articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Time running out for Samson; debut likely in pace department: India predicted XI - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Time is running out for Sanju Samson as India take on South Africa in the third ODI. Here is their predicted XI. | Cricket
articles.content: With the three-match series level at 1-1, India face South Africa in the decider, at Boland Park in Paarl on Thursday. The visitors began the series with an eight-wicket victory and took a 1-0 lead. … [+2445 chars]
